column1: #Text=Zuko says : " No one can make tea like Uncle , but hopefully I learned a thing or two .
#Text=Well , I ca n't remember how it starts , but the punch line is " Leaf me alone , I 'm bushed ! "
#Text=Well , it 's funnier when Uncle tells it .
#Text=" Katara says : " Right ... maybe that 's because he remembers the whole thing .
#Text=" Toph says : " It 's nice to get a chance to relax a little .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , can I talk to you for a second ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " If someone was captured by the Fire Nation , where would they be taken ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " When the invasion plan failed , some of our troops were taken .
#Text=I just want to know where they might be .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I ca n't tell you .
#Text=Knowing would just make you feel worse .
#Text=I need to know what I put him through .
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's not good , Sokka .
#Text=" Zuko says : " My guess is , they were taken to the Boiling Rock .
#Text=" Zuko says : " The highest security prison in the Fire Nation .
#Text=It 's on an island in the middle of a boiling lake .
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , where is this place ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " Why do you need to know ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " It 's in the middle of a volcano between here and the Fire Nation .
#Text=You guys actually flew right past it on your way here .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Yeah , I 'm sure it does .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Not up to anything , huh ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fine , you caught me .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , I have to do this .
#Text=The invasion plan was my idea , it was my decision to stay when things were going wrong .
#Text=It 's my mistake , and it 's my job to fix it .
#Text=" Zuko says : " You need to regain your honor ?
#Text=" Zuko says : " How are you going to get there ?
#Text=Last time I checked , prisons do n't have bison daycares .
